lines.text: [after initially raping and later having consensual sex with her younger neighbor]
I do hope you forgive me, even though I'm not sorry for what happened. You know, my husband left me a long time ago for a much younger woman. This is my first time since he left. I really needed it.
There's nothing to forgive. I'm very happy for what you did.
[Teddy stands naked in his room when his older neighbor barges in naked, throws him on his bed and gives him a fellatio]
Ms. Robinson. Ms. Robinson. Stop! Please, Ms. Robinson.
Oh no, I must have it! Please! Please! Please.
Jeff, really you know? We don't have to tell the entire world on what we do and what we're up to.
I want you to make a few rounds around the field before I let you make a touchdown.
Don't you come in me. I don't see you wanna support me rest of your life, you understand? I don't wanna really be a mother yet.
Mrs. Robinson, it's Ted. Ted. Ted. I am eighteen years old, you know, not eight. When you are eight, you're Teddy; when you're eighteen, you're Ted.
